topics.body:
"@igotnopicks":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a3c8f86368724dee001025#post_55a3c8f86368724dee001025

I disagree wholeheartedly. No matter what happens now, he's ruined. There will _always_ be people who think he's a child molester, and Subway sure as hell won't take him back. He's ruined.

"@Ore-O":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a3ce2c6368724f440015d1#post_55a3ce2c6368724f440015d1

Fuck...don't remind me about Iwata.

If there's a heaven, I hope that man gets see and live _every single moment_ he made a gamer's day. He didn't get enough credit when he was alive...coming from someone who sure as hell didn't give him enough credit when he was alive.
